analysis.description:
BoonTech.setFounderAllocation (/unique_chucks/5/0xe83e098eedb43b33d340d4757529e5a2c4ee3230.sol#266-276) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(allocations[_recipient].totalAllocated == 0 && _totalAllocated > 0)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0xe83e098eedb43b33d340d4757529e5a2c4ee3230.sol:
	Contract BoonTech has payable functions:
	 - buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xe83e098eedb43b33d340d4757529e5a2c4ee3230.sol#336-339)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

BoonTech.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/5/0xe83e098eedb43b33d340d4757529e5a2c4ee3230.sol#194-196) shadows:
	- ERC20.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/5/0xe83e098eedb43b33d340d4757529e5a2c4ee3230.sol#68-69)

BoonTech.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0xe83e098eedb43b33d340d4757529e5a2c4ee3230.sol#192)
